title: Uncovering causal relationships in multimodal biological data: A new framework presented at ICLR

title: Causality meets reality: CausalVerse gives AI a harder, fairer test
preview_text: New NeurIPS 2025 work introduces CausalVerse, a large benchmark marrying realistic visuals with ground-truth causal graphs for CRL.

title: Causality’s role in drug development and precision medicine
